item.title: Cameras, app to track ticketless travel on Mumbai's BEST buses
item.description: BEST is adopting technology to enhance services and monitor bus driver behavior, implementing audit cameras for passenger counts, mobile apps for monitoring ticketless travel, and driver consoles. They plan to expand digital ticketing and the tap-in, tap-out fare system across more city buses, while also investing in the power distribution network.

item.title: Venomous snake slithers up driver's leg on Australia motorway
item.description: Police say the woman was "rattled" and "in a state of shock" when she looked down to find the deadly snake by her feet.

item.title: Venomous tiger snake slithers up driver’s leg on Melbourne freeway
item.description:
Woman weaves through traffic at 80km/h before fleeing from snake in car barefoot and attempting to flag down passing motorists

  • Follow our Australia news live blog for latest updates
  • Get our breaking news email, free app or daily news podcast

Victoria police have carried out one of the “more bizarre welfare checks” after a deadly tiger snake slithered up a driver’s leg as she was travelling at 80km/h on a major freeway.

Police said they were called to Monash Freeway near the Toorak Rd exit in Melbourne’s eastern suburbs on Saturday morning after receiving reports of a barefoot woman trying to flag down passing traffic.
